exports.constrainAst: function e(t){let n=arguments.length>1&&void 0!==arguments[1]?arguments[1]:{limit:200};if(Array.isArray(t)){let a=t.length;for(let s=0;s<a;s++){let a=e(t[s],n);if(a===i){t.length=s;break}t[s]=a}}else if("text"!==t.type){if(n.limit-=1,n.limit<=0)return i;Array.isArray(t.content)&&(t.content=e(t.content,n))}return t}
